HotelElement.Name: Riullette Hotel Riu A Determinar 24 H Antes

Description.Text: Built in 1985 and renovated in 2001, the air-conditioned complex includes two 2-storey buildings with a total of 188 apartments. Guests are provided with a pretty, large garden, a large pool area, and arrive in a welcoming lobby with a reception manned around the clock, a cloakroom, a hotel safe, a currency exchange desk and lifts. In addition, facilities include a games room, a TV room, a supermarket, a café, a pretty bar, an air-conditioned à la carte restaurant with a separate non-smoking area and highchairs for infants (on request). Services include a room and laundry service, Internet access, a doctor on call, a bicycle cellar, a kids club, a playground and parking facilities.
